testcase.classname: Test to validate user is able to add any item to card and checkout the item
testcase.name: User is able to add product and checkout
testcase.system-out: Given Go to website and navigate to Computer section........................passed When click on Notebook and Filter the product to get result.................passed And Add item to cart........................................................passed And Go to shopping cart and verify item.....................................passed And Checkout and register the user..........................................passed And Navigate to shopping cart to increase quality and fill details to buy item.passed Then verify user item.......................................................passed
